name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - Pepper Cream Soda Boxpress - Robusto
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, Pepper Cream Soda Boxpress
additionalNotes:
In 2014 Robert Caldwell founded Caldwell Cigar Company and Down&Back Distribution and proceeded to create a portfolio of very special brands and collaborations. Caldwell Cigar Company was created with a very simple agenda: "to create special cigars using well aged rare tobaccos and to enjoy the 
Caldwell products are built using very well aged and rare tobaccos. They use such aged tobacco to provide year-over-year consistency in flavor and experience.  To control consistency, they age the tobacco for a very long time. The company has always leaned towards tobaccos that were harder to procure, or more limited in nature, so that they can deliver a flavor that isn’t quite what you cigar aficionados are used to.
